column2: Makes the intrigue cheat menu visible.
Hides the intrigue cheat menu from view.
Give yourself 5000 points in your society.
Increase your rank in your society.
Give yourself 10000 of each type of techpoints.
Converts all courtiers, lords and provinces in your realm to your culture.
Converts all courtiers, lords and provinces in your realm to your religion.
Converts all people in your realm to your ethnicity.
Spawn a 10000-man army at your capital.
Spawn a 100000-man army at your capital.
Spawn a 1000 ships for your fleet.
Changes your government type to Feudalism.
Converts all characters and provinces to your religion.
Converts all characters and provinces to your culture (Doesn't work on nomads).
Converts all characters to your ethnicity.
Removes cheat traits from all characters besides you.
Reveal all plots in your realm.
All units can move provinces in 1 day.
